nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occur in 7 days.
          
          
            
              recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs within 7 days.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+#These are the default settings for stalebot. Please update
+#comments if this file is modified. https://github.com/apps/stale
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 60
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed
+daysUntilClose: 7
+# Issues with these labels will never be considered stale
+exemptLabels:
+  - pinned
+  - security
+# Label to use when marking an issue as stale
+staleLabel: wontfix
+# Comment to post when marking an issue as stale. Set to `false` to disable
+# Added 7 days to match days until close.
+markComment: >
+  This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had
+  recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occur in 7 days.

@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+#These are the default settings for stalebot. Please update
+#comments if this file is modified. https://github.com/apps/stale
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 60
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed
+daysUntilClose: 7
+# Issues with these labels will never be considered stale
+exemptLabels:
+  - pinned
+  - security
+# Label to use when marking an issue as stale
+staleLabel: wontfix
+# Comment to post when marking an issue as stale. Set to `false` to disable
+# Added 7 days to match days until close.
+markComment: >
+  This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had
+  recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occur in 7 days.

nodes.bodyText: We can try this but I wonder if this will close tickets while people are on vacation.  Wondering if 14 days would help avoid that.  Thoughts?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+#These are the default settings for stalebot. Please update
+#comments if this file is modified. https://github.com/apps/stale
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 60
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed
+daysUntilClose: 7

nodes.bodyText: I'm open to make it longer, but this already has a long stale period of 60 days of activity so really you are talking over two months of inactivity. Can also re-open if needed.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+#These are the default settings for stalebot. Please update
+#comments if this file is modified. https://github.com/apps/stale
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 60
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed
+daysUntilClose: 7

nodes.bodyText: @pklinef with the amount of approvers I'm recommending we keep it as it is and adjust later if necessary. I think we can have people give it activity if somebody is on an extended vacation, but hopefully people consider this before vacation now :-)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+#These are the default settings for stalebot. Please update
+#comments if this file is modified. https://github.com/apps/stale
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 60
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed
+daysUntilClose: 7

nodes.bodyText: I think the default will work well for PRs.  Stale issues I could see being closed but we can always reopen them when we get back.
nodes.diffHunk:
